medical_history.chief_complaint: Infective costochondritis following bilateral skin-sparing mastectomies and reconstruction.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient complained of pain at the left costal margin one week post-surgery, which worsened, leading to readmission. Examination showed severe pain and tenderness at the site.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Strong family history of breast carcinoma; no other relevant medical history specified.
medical_history.family_history: Strong family history of breast carcinoma.
